mapper.select: select member_id, member_rank_id, member_dept_id, member_role_id, member_pw, member_name, member_enabled, member_regdate, member_update_date from members where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: insert into members ( member_id, member_rank_id, member_dept_id, member_role_id, member_pw, member_name, member_enabled, member_regdate ) values ( #{memberId}, 1, 1, 1, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{memberEnabled}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') )
